product_name: White Sierra Shiva T-Shirt - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The women's White Sierra Shiva T-Shirt is ready for your outdoor festivals this summer, thanks to a warm-weather-loving blend of cotton and polyester and supercool burnout and screen print. 50% cotton/50% polyester knit wicks moisture and dries faster than all-cotton knits, making it travel friendly. Garment-dyed, custom burnout base fabric has a screen print on the front. White Sierra Shiva T-Shirt features rolled short sleeves. The Shiva tee is designed and produced in California. Special buy.
short_description: The women's White Sierra Shiva T-Shirt is ready for your outdoor festivals this summer, thanks to a warm-weather-loving blend of cotton and polyester and supercool burnout and screen print.
